name: efficaciously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal in a way that is able to produce the intended result: These politicians are interested in learning how to govern more efficaciously. We want to hire qualified people who can make our IT system work efficaciously. Synonym
effectively
medical
  specialized (used about a treatment or a drug) in a way that works well under controlled scientific testing conditions: It might be possible to use the two drugs in combination efficaciously. These medications efficaciously treat psychosis.
More examplesFewer examplesThe new curriculum is used most efficaciously in large schools.They were able to present their ideas very efficaciously. The pill works most efficaciously if it's taken at the same time every day.This procedure can be carried out safely and efficaciously by trained surgeons.
